org.jgentleframework.core.reflection
Interface FieldIdentification

All Superinterfaces:
Identification<java.lang.reflect.Field>, MemberIdentification<java.lang.reflect.Field>
public interface FieldIdentification
extends MemberIdentification<java.lang.reflect.Field>

This interface represents the field identification, designates a field or a set of fields corresponding to declaring class and one regular expression of name. The identification data shall be used conjointly with reflection tools in order to access specified fields.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
